title: 'Good quality and comfort'
body: These pillows are fantastic! They are incredibly soft and thick, providing a level of comfort that surpasses even some very popular brand pillows. I was so pleased with these pillows that I bought another set as well. Highly recommended for a good night's sleep!

title: 'Dislike! Recieved only 2 pillows'
body: 'Recieved only 2 pillows! Ordered this because of 4 pillows'

title: 'Quality product'
body: 'The media could not be loaded. Pillow is soft and nice. Amazing to have nice pillow fight tooü´£üòÇüòç value for money'

title: 'I got a great deal on this'
body: 'Bought a pack of 4 at a deep discount. Very high quality product. No complaints.'

title: 'Very Comfortable'
body: Pillows are soft and comfortable ...it's got a zip on the side You can easily add or reduce the fiber in it to get desired thickness or thinnness Extra fiber provided along with...good quality..you need large pillow covers with it though

title: 'Quality not good'
body: 'For few days shape was good but just in 15 days showing its quality not up to the mark if I hav any option to return certainly I would like to go for it'

title: 'Not as expected'
body: 'I thought of best quality pillows but unfortunately it was opposite. The product was looking very ince in pictures only. Anyways it w a learning'

title: 'Fake'
body: 'The media could not be loaded. Dislike'

title: 'Nice product'
body: 'Really soft smooth and comfy to use. Good quality too'

title: 'Comfortable'
body: 'Comfortable and soft like the USP of this product.'

title: 'Pillows set of 6'
body: 'Very very awesome pillows my children is loving the pillows.'

title: 'Affordable'
body: Good for shot naps, for long sleeps it's bit sweating

title: 'Satisfief'
body: 'No problem at all. We are using without any difficulty. Recommending others to buy the same. Thanks to Amazon for locating our requirements.'

title: 'Not fit for sleeping. Too slippery'
body: 'The pillow never gets soft. It is too bulky. The filling is not appropriate for sleeping. The pillow should align with body weight. Not satisfied with the product.'

title: 'Quality'
body: 'Comfy soft pillows Great deal for 6 pillows Good vacuum packaging'

title: 'Amazing'
body: 'It is good product to buy I got as I expected I have been using from 6months still softness and comfort are superb'

title: 'Not a pillow at all.'
body: 'The less said the better. It is so thin that you are almost shelling without a pillow.'

title: 'Value for money'
body: 'Product is very good. Pillow is smooth breathable and 100%paisa vasool.'

title: 'Soft material'
body: 'Soft material had a good sleep using this.'

title: 'VERY GOOD.'
body: 'GOOD QUALITY BUT NOT BEST. SHOULD DECREASE PRICE AND MAKE IT BEST.'

title: 'Uncomfortable for long use'
body: 'Price is fine but after using for a couple of days its very flat. Definitely needs some extra filling or 2 pillows stacked instead of 1.'

title: 'Worst quality product'
body: 'Within 2 months they lost their puffiness.worst quality microfiber is used inside.'
